mohu guwan gamane yedenna kalinma adhikawa mathpan wagema mathdrawya bawitha karanawa.pare wahanayakwath mathdrawya aran elawanna barikota guwan yanayak padewwama kohomata thiyewida kiyala hithaganna puluwanne.namuth mohu puruddak wage ee widiyata thamayi guwan yanaya piyasara karanne.namuth me kiyana dinaye ohuge guwan yanayata darunu iranamak athwenawa.meyin pasu ohuge jiwithe wenama paththakata thalluwenna hethuwak wenawa.thawa wadi wisthara kiyanna yanne naha oba chithrapatiya aragenama balanna.mema chithrapatiya paya 2yi winadi 10k purawata diwa yanawa.aniwaryen oba narambaanna.
kali kapala wisthara karanna ooni naha.
